Never played UO past beta. I thought it was crap.
Yes... I was using my pottery skill to buy my
spells... but listen... I sunk 60 or more plat intio
pottery just to be able to make a profit! And that
was when I was 10th level! not like I had a cash
flowing out of my ears! So it wasn't like I was just
suddenly good at pottery. It was a HUGE pain in the
ass! No to mention I was a troll on the pvp server...
which meant the only place i could buy sketches was
all the way down in sro... so i was constantly going
fro neriak to sro,... neriak had the pottery wheel
and SRO had the sketches. So here I habve wasted all
this time traveling and spending money to get the
skill up... and now it is going to be totally
useless! I wouldn't care if they lowered the profit
margin in half... but dam it...if youre going to have
a skill in the game.... then make it friggin' have
SOME kind of use and value!

What they are doing is not balancing.... it just
plain sucks. And, there's a lot of things sucking
about this game lately and it is starting to really
tick me off. It is supposed to gtet better with
time... not worse.

There is no use fopr pottery now... no use for
brewing... and no use for baking... so why not take
them out of the game completely?

And just so you know... My troll only makes about 15
plat an hour... and I can do that with a party
killing dervs. But when I don't have a party to get
with... it was sure nice to make a little money till
one came along.
-Kenny
